main event: A bright green object with a long tail was sighted over Hudson Strait, Canada.
interesting points: The sighting duration was only between 1 to 2 seconds., The object disappeared instantaneously after being observed., It was categorized as a typical 'green fireball' phenomenon., The observation was made using ground-visual methods., The report was part of Project Blue Book records.
sighted object: bright green object with long tail
witness description: saw only tail of the object
